title: Yi is incredibly broken and needs to be nerfed (Preferably to the ground? Or Removal from game?)
body:
As the title says...

I am honestly getting sick of {{champion:11}}. He pretty much has a invincibility ability (Q) and a heal (W) that blocks the majority of damage. In my opinion, something has to be done about {{champion:11}} - let it be a nerf or removal from the game.
